Description: Potential! Potential! Potential! Ever dreamed of owning your very own old west town? Here is your chance! Whether your needs are residential, agricultural or commercial, this property is sure to please. The panorama of privacy, peace, & possibility leave little to be desired in this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that celebrates the old western era.
